title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.16 - Report of interference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.16 - Report of interference

State Regulations

It is the duty of every driver to report to the official
designated for such purpose by the presiding judge, as promptly after the
conclusion of a race in which such driver has participated as possible, any
interference to himself or herself or his or her horse by another horse or
driver during a race. Failure to report such interference may be the subject of
disciplinary action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4117.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
